cause.description:
Barry Bonds is only a few short home runs away from breaking Hank Aaron's all time home run mark of 755 home runs. Aaron broke this record with pure skill and athleticism and it is a shame to see it broken by a cheater who doesn't break it through skill, but through taking steroids.
1. Bonds' record must be boycotted in every way possible
cause.mission: protest the record that Barry Bonds is about to break. He is a steroid junkie and he is undeserving of it.
cause.name: Those against Barry Bonds breaking the Home Run Record
